name: Ninja Hamster and the Mutant Zombie Bunnies
name_original: Ninja Hamster and the Mutant Zombie Bunnies
description:
Ninja Hamster and the Mutant Zombie Bunnies

Finish the game in 5 minutes...

This is a submission to the WeeklyGameJam under the theme: Finish Line

Controls:

XBOX Controller: DPad or Analog Stick, A to jump and X to slash

Keyboard: AWSD or Arrow Keys, J or Ctrl to slash and K or SPACE to jump

Credits:

I did everything.
